chapter.title: JBoss Messaging Clustering Introduction
chapter.para: This guide gives a brief overview of the features available in JBoss Messaging Clustering 1.2.0.Beta2
It also gives a high level explanation of how clustering works and shows you how to set up a simple cluster of JBoss Messaging servers.
This guide is work in progress.
It will expand considerably for the 1.2.0 GA release.
Please send your suggestions or comments to the JBoss Messaging user forum.
